description: driver seated on a carriage, LLC; man pulling cart, bottom center, with a walking woman; other pedestrians and horse at left; view of river with cluster of bare trees in ULC; buildings on opposite bank of river
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

LRC, in brown: illegible inscription
markings: LRC on image, stamped in red: [ALL] (L.141); LRC, in pencil: [2e état no 4]
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1993; sold in April for PRTO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1993-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: The Tip of Ile St-Louis and the Dock of Hôtel-de-Ville
